cancellation.title: Cancellation policy
cancellation.description: Cancellation is possible until 18 o'clock before arrival free of charge
cancellation.to-cancel: To cancel your booking, please click on the button below
cancellation.enter-booking: Enter your Booking number and your e-mail address and click on the "Cancel Booking" button to cancel your reservation.
cancellation.cancel-booking: To cancel your booking, please click on the button below

top.description: Customize the online booking engine with your brand’s look-and-feel. Add your logo, colors, address, email and phone number, languages, currencies, and much more.
top.info: Transform your website into the most profitable online sales channel

features.calendar: CultBooking is a hotel booking engine, or booking button, for hotels, motels, hostels, B&Bs, lodges & guest houses, apartments, villas, or other property and accommodation providers.
features.booking: Guests can quickly and seamlessly book rooms directly from your website, social media platforms, or ad campaigns, resulting in loyal guests and a maximized online revenue.
features.commission: Worried about commission fees? Enjoy commission-free bookings by adding a simple code to your website to start receiving reservations.

try.title: Try it Out!
try.description: Select an arrival and departure date, then click on search to view available rooms and rates.

description.top: The CultBooking hotel booking engine will reformat itself and adapt to any mobile phone or tablet device. Larger navigation buttons, reformatted content and optimized images appear when the user is on a mobile device.
description.bottom: No matter what device your clients are on, the guest experience begins with beautiful UX/UI design and an intuitive booking process.

booking.title: 24/7 booking button
booking.description: Use our booking engine to entice around-the-clock direct bookings. Drive conversions on your website with all the perks that CultBooking has to offer, including commission-free direct bookings and effective technology.

description.top: Our goal is simple — help you convert clients into loyal guests. Automated machine learning, heat maps, and A/B testing allows us to optimize the booking process and increase revenue and business.
description.bottom: We are here to get you the highest conversion rates in the market using specific Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): high conversion rates, finalized bookings, and confirmed reservations.

description.top:
Simplify your operations.
Don’t worry about complex installation or difficult settings — the booking engine can be integrated into your website with a simple snippet. We provide the code and the developer to insert it.
description.bottom: The booking engine is also integrated with your Channel Manager and Property Management System (PMS)

footer.title: Turn your website into the most profitable online sales channel or Contact us for more details!

systems.title: Systems
systems.title-full: Property Management / Channel Management / Revenue Management
systems.title-sub:
We offer fully integrated systems as well as with non-direct connection. For non-direct connection systems you need to contact the hotel
software company to activate the software interface to CultSwitch in the hotel software.
systems.connection-tooltip: After you select wich the data will be sent automatically from the hotel software (i.e Availability and Rates) the data can no longer be changed manually in the CSI. All changes can be done directly in the hotel software.

modal.hotel-key-placeholder: Enter or paste your Hotel ID
modal.account-id-placeholder: Enter or paste your Account ID

mapping.title: Mapping
mapping.title-sub:
We offer fully integrated systems as well as with non-direct connection. For non-direct connection systems you need to contact the hotel
software company to activate the software interface to CultSwitch in the hotel software.

sepa.info: We will collect the amount due via the SEPA direct debit scheme by using the creditor ID and mandate reference number below. We shall inform you that we will make the direct debit transaction at least two days in advance by stating this in your invoice.

labels.authorize: I authorize CultBooking to collect the amount due from the account specified.The direct debit authorization may be revoked in writing at any time.
